channel.title: NPC clipping/definitions updates to resemble objects
channel.description: I need NPCs to act like objects without having the need to spawn objects. I want certain 1 square NPCs to resemble 1 square objects such as a summoning obelisk. I don't want to be able to cast or range through the NPC.

item.title: NPC clipping/definitions updates to resemble objects

item.title: NPC clipping/definitions updates to resemble objects

item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

You could edit the menu indexes in the client, then just set the entity to stationary.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC clipping/definitions updates to resemble objects

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“iTanner, post:1, topic:517931”]I need NPCs to act like objects without having the need to spawn objects. I want certain 1 square NPCs to resemble 1 square objects such as a summoning obelisk. I don’t want to be able to cast or range through the NPC.

prices discussed over skype : tannersmexy[/quote]Someone didn’t read the rules.

Unlike R-S, we don’t allow any sort of payment or reward for help. I suggest taking that out of your thread, else a moderator will lock it.

Read full topic
